title: Business Practical Competency Enhancement: Blended Learning for Portuguese Gender Grammar Acquisition

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can classify Portuguese noun genders with 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply gender agreement rules between adjectives/pronouns and nouns in real sentences.
Learners can select context-appropriate gender expressions in gender-specific social situations (résumé writing, official documents).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
